link.title: Dove Hill Home and School Club News
Silver Oak School News

br.span: From Strong Roots Grow Bright Futures

td.style: text-align:left; border-right:solid 1px #e0e0e0 !important; width:25%; vertical-align:top; padding:4px; background-color:#fff; color:#000;

ul.li:
All Evergreen School District schools will not reopen for classroom instruction this 2019-2020 school year. Academic instruction will continue through distance learning until the last day of school on June 12.
[Read story]

td.style: text-align:left; border-right:solid 1px #e0e0e0 !important; width:25%; vertical-align:top; padding:2px; background-color:#fff; color:#000;

br.li:
Santa Clara County Public Health Coronavirus Help Line:
408-885-3980
M-F 8 a.m.-5 p.m.

li.a: Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

td.style: text-align:left; border-right:solid 1px #e0e0e0 !important; width:25%; vertical-align:top; padding:2px; background-color:#fff; color:#000;

li.a: About Distance Learning For ESD Parents 2020

br.li:
Technical Support Helpline:
408-270-6866,
M-F 11 a.m.-2 p.m.
Email: help@eesd.org

span.a: Continuous Learning Family Resources - Printable Learning Packets

td.style: text-align:left; border-right:solid 0px #e0e0e0 !important; width:25%; vertical-align:top; padding:2px; background-color:#fff; color:#000;

br.span: (Diapers and wipes available Thursdays through 5/28, while supplies last)

li.a: Care Solace Mental Health Resource for Families
Support Resources from Evergreen Counseling Staff

div.p: We understand that the school consolidation process is met with many questions and concerns by our community. To help keep you up to date, please visit our School Consolidation webpages with news and announcements, a timeline, FAQs, and additional background all designed to keep you informed through every step of the process.

br.p:
5:00 p.m. Call To Order (Convene to Closed Session)
Via Zoom Tele-conference
View ALL Meeting Agendas and Minutes at BoardDocs.com

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
